node.title: The phones aren't ringing off the hook for this travel agent ahead of WA border reopening
node.alt: A man and his daughter walk with luggage at the domestic terminal in Brisbane airpor.
node.description: As airlines enjoy a spike in bookings ahead of WA's border reopening, travel agents fear they are not out of the woods yet.Â
node.content:
["Airlines have reported a big jump in bookings since Western Australia announced its reopening date, but some WA travel agents fear their businesses are entering a third year of suffering.", "Anticipation was high in the lead-up to the WA government's Monday announcement\u00a0that the state's hard border would fall on February 5.", "On Tuesday, Virgin Australia said there had been a 420 per cent increase in bookings for flights into Perth\u00a0from Melbourne, Sydney and Brisbane since the announcement.", "A spokesperson for the airline told the ABC bookings had\u00a0jumped\u00a0from an average of 70 per cent behind 2019 levels, to be in line with the level of demand enjoyed in 2019, in just\u00a0one day.\u00a0", "", "
Virgin Australia has recorded an explosion in demand for interstate flights into Perth.\u00a0(AAP: Richard Wainwright)
", "The spokesperson\u00a0said Victorians were the most eager to get to WA, with a 760 per cent jump in sales on the previous day.\u00a0", "A Qantas spokesperson said they had also seen strong demand for all early services when borders open.\u00a0", "They\u00a0said Qantas was scheduled to start flying internationally from Perth to London, and to Singapore, from March 27.", "
Outlook less peachy for Perth travel agent
", "But Global Travel Solutions owner Jo Francis said the only calls she had received since the announcement were people cancelling their December and January bookings, or their planned trips to Queensland.", "", "
Jo Francis says people are still hesitant to book flights out of WA.\u00a0 \u00a0(ABC News: Rhiannon Shine)
", "\"The phone is not ringing off the hook [for bookings],\" Ms Francis said.", "\"I have got departures for Tasmania, but I'm very confident they will cancel in the next week or two once they open this week to the rest of Australia and international [travellers] and COVID enters there.\"", "Like many others in her industry, Ms Francis saw hers business devastated by the pandemic.", "Just before it hit in March 2020, she had hired four staff and spent $100,000 on fitting out her office. Her predominantly overseas travel agency was starting to really take off.", "She had to let all of those staff go and close the office when the pandemic struck.\u00a0", "Almost two years on, she is still trading 90 per cent below what she was before COVID-19.", "And Ms Francis believes\u00a0the February reopening date will do little to help.", "She is\u00a0particularly worried that people will still be hesitant to travel into and out of WA, and that COVID-19 testing requirements for travellers will put people off, with confusion surrounding who will\u00a0foot the bill for the tests.", "", "
There will be strict testing requirements for people coming to WA from interstate and overseas.(AAP: Luis Ascui)
", "She said people had started booking international and domestic travel for 2023, but a lot of hesitancy and nerves still hung over next year.", "\"We keep trying to pivot, we keep trying to find ways to save our businesses, but we need help,\" she said.", "\"While borders are closed, you have a responsibility to the people who are suffering, and that is the travel agents, tourism, events.", "\"And February 5 is not the saving grace.", "\"Unfortunately it is not enough. We need real financial support.", "\"We were grateful for the support we got in August 2020.\u00a0", "\"But it is now December 2021.\"", "", "
Why we hear about some COVID-19 variants more than others
"]
